minimum_internal_track_width.description: The minimum nominal width of conductors on internal/unplated layers (minimum track).

minimum_external_track_width.description: The minimum nominal width of conductors on external/plated layers (minimum track). If only only one minimum track is present, is should be here.

minimum_internal_spacing_width.description: The minimum gap between two conductors on the internal layers.

minimum_external_spacing_width.description: The minimum gap between two conductors on the external layers. If only one minimum gap is present, is should be here.

external_base_copper_thickness.description: Finished base copper thickness following IPC Class on the up to two external layers in micrometer.

internal_base_copper_thickness.description: Finished base copper thickness following IPC Class on the internal layers in micrometer.

copper_foil_roughness.description: The roughness of the copper foil.

copper_coverage_average.description: The average copper coverage of the board. UoM is percentage

finish.description: The material/method/surface to be used in the finish.

area.description: The area that the finish will cover, in square decimeter.

color.description: This describes the color based on the name of the color; green, black, blue, red, white, yellow. If a specific color needs to be defined, this can be done custom -> colors section.

min_thickness.description: The minimum thickness of the soldermask.

max_thickness.description: The maximum thickness of the soldermask.

material.description: The name of a material that appears in the materials section

allow_touchups.description: The manufacturer is allowed to do touchups on the soldermask if true

color.description: This describes the color based on the name of the color; white, yellow. If a specific color needs to be defined, this can be done custom -> colors section.

size.description: The size of the stiffener should be specified in drawing

placement.description: Indicating if the stiffener is on top or bottom of the flexible layer.

material.description: The name of a material that appears in the materials section

total_thickness.description: The total thickness of the coverlay

material.description: The name of a material that appears in the materials -> soldermask section

top.description: Indicates peelable mask presence/capability at top

bottom.description: Indicates peelable mask presence/capability at bottom
